"Some of the material in this volume originally appeared in Vietnam journal #1-4, from Apple Comics."

Includes two features that appeared regularly in Vietnam journal: 'Back in the world' which recaps news of the day as reported by various newspapers, magazines, and wire services and 'Missing American' which profiles American POW/MIAs who have never been accounted for.
